DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to optimize the search by next-generation sequencing (NGS) mutations in the KRAS, BRAF and NRAS on circulating tumor DNA and compare the genetic profiles obtained with those from tumors embedded in paraffin
DOC.brief_title: Technical Optimization of Detection of KRAS, BRAF and NRAS Mutations on Tumor DNA Circulating in Metastatic Colorectal Cancer
